doc.title: MELTING
doc.reference: Nicolas Le Novere (2001), MELTING, computing the melting temperature of nucleic acid duplex. Bioinformatics 17(12), 1226-1227

interface.label: Hybridisation type (-H) Choose an hybidation type Dna/Dna Dna/Rna Rna/Rna

Nearest Neighbor parameters set (-A)?
Default DNA/DNA hybridisation of Allawi et al 1997 DNA/DNA hybridisation of Breslauer et al 1986 DNA/DNA hybridisation of SantaLucia et al 1996 DNA/DNA hybridisation of Sugimoto et al 1996 RNA/RNA hybridisation of Freier et al 1986 RNA/RNA hybridisation of Xia et al 1998 DNA/RNA hybridisation of Sugimoto et al 1995
Informs the program to use file.nn as an alternative set of nearest-neighbor parameters, rather than the default for the specified hybridisation type (option -H). melting provides some files ready-to-use:
all97a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of Allawi and SantaLucia(1997). Biochemistry 36 : 10581-10594)
bre86a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of Breslauer et al. (1986). Proc Natl Acad Sci USA 83 : 3746-3750)
san96a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of SantaLucia et al.(1996). Biochemistry 35 : 3555-3562)
sug96a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of Sugimoto et al.(1996). Nuc Acids Res 24 : 4501-4505)
fre86a.nn (RNA/RNA hybridisation of Freier et al (1986) Proc Natl Acad Sci USA 83: 9373-9377)
xia98a.nn (RNA/RNA hybridisation of Xia et al (1998) Biochemistry 37: 14719-14735)
sug95a.nn (DNA/RNA hybridisation of Sugimoto et al. (1995). Biochemistry 34 : 11211-11216)
Be careful, the option -A changes the default parameter set defined by the option -H.
Sequence string (-S)

Complementary sequence (-C)?
Enters the complementary sequence, from 3’ to 5’. This option is mandatory if there are mismatches between the two strands. If it is not used, the program will compute it as the complement of the sequence entered with the option -S.
5' GTGAGCTCAT 3' 3' CACTCGAGTA 5'

Salt concentration (-N)?
Value must be greater than 0.0 and lower than 10.0

Nucleic acid concentration in excess (-P)?
Value must be greater than 0.0 and lower than 0.1
Nucleic acid correction factor (-F)

Salt correction (-K)
Wetmur 1991 SantaLucia et al. 1996 SantaLucia 1998
Force approximative temperature computation (-x) Yes No
Use parameters for dangling ends (dnadnade.nn) (-D)? Yes No
Use parameters for mismatches (dnadnamm.nn) (-M)? Yes No

xhtml:div.div:
Informs the program to use file.nn as an alternative set of nearest-neighbor parameters, rather than the default for the specified hybridisation type (option -H). melting provides some files ready-to-use:
all97a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of Allawi and SantaLucia(1997). Biochemistry 36 : 10581-10594)
bre86a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of Breslauer et al. (1986). Proc Natl Acad Sci USA 83 : 3746-3750)
san96a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of SantaLucia et al.(1996). Biochemistry 35 : 3555-3562)
sug96a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of Sugimoto et al.(1996). Nuc Acids Res 24 : 4501-4505)
fre86a.nn (RNA/RNA hybridisation of Freier et al (1986) Proc Natl Acad Sci USA 83: 9373-9377)
xia98a.nn (RNA/RNA hybridisation of Xia et al (1998) Biochemistry 37: 14719-14735)
sug95a.nn (DNA/RNA hybridisation of Sugimoto et al. (1995). Biochemistry 34 : 11211-11216)
Be careful, the option -A changes the default parameter set defined by the option -H.

Enters the complementary sequence, from 3’ to 5’. This option is mandatory if there are mismatches between the two strands. If it is not used, the program will compute it as the complement of the sequence entered with the option -S.
5' GTGAGCTCAT 3' 3' CACTCGAGTA 5'

xhtml:div.xhtml:div: Value must be greater than 0.0 and lower than 10.0
Value must be greater than 0.0 and lower than 0.1

format.code: ( "" , " -A" + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

comment.div:
Informs the program to use file.nn as an alternative set of nearest-neighbor parameters, rather than the default for the specified hybridisation type (option -H). melting provides some files ready-to-use:
all97a.nn (DNA/DNA hybridisation of Allawi and SantaLucia(1997). Biochemistry 36 : 10581-10594)

sug95a.nn (DNA/RNA hybridisation of Sugimoto et al. (1995). Biochemistry 34 : 11211-11216)
Be careful, the option -A changes the default parameter set defined by the option -H.

interface.label: Sequence string (-S)

comment.div:
Enters the complementary sequence, from 3’ to 5’. This option is mandatory if there are mismatches between the two strands. If it is not used, the program will compute it as the complement of the sequence entered with the option -S.
5' GTGAGCTCAT 3' 3' CACTCGAGTA 5'

interface.label:
Complementary sequence (-C)?
Enters the complementary sequence, from 3’ to 5’. This option is mandatory if there are mismatches between the two strands. If it is not used, the program will compute it as the complement of the sequence entered with the option -S.
5' GTGAGCTCAT 3' 3' CACTCGAGTA 5'
